name: Ad_Opt
description:
Adapt to your only option.

You have only one option. Adapt. Because what else are you gonna do?

You will never see the end.

Controls: Mainly mouse + Any key.
Greyed-out/red target cursor represents if you can click currently.

Sadly due to a bug the end screen cannot be reached. And the game is generally a lot harder than intended. Have fun speedrunning 🙃. Or just take a moment to take everything in and hopefully enjoy the concept and maybe even figure out some of the "Lore".

Source
